attributes.action: Create a canopy over the motorway network to catch rainwater to add to public water supply.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a canopy over the motorway network to catch rainwater to add to public water supply. Additional benefits of the canopy is that roads can remain free of snow (save costs of gritting) and rain (less accidents as there will be no skidding in wet and poor visibility due to spray/rain will be eliminated).
